<h3 id="X31480">X(31480) = CENTROID OF CURVATURES OF THESE CIRCLES: {INCIRCLE, STAMMLER, STEINER}</h3>
Barycentrics &nbsp;&nbsp; 3*a^4-(5*b^2+12*b*c+5*c^2)*a^2+2*(b^2-c^2)^2  :  :
<p>X(31480) lies on these lines:
